features.html:
Ubi Decius ad ludum accedebat, ingentem multitudinem 

iuvenum prope ianuam conspexit. Causam tanti tumultus 

quaerit.

choicesHtml: sees a group of silent young men walking away from the school
sees a large group looking for young men at the door of the school
is afraid of the noisy group of young men standing by the door of the school
is curious about why a group of young men have gathered at the door of the school
